ch0020_40_toya/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you get
some candy for tonight?
ch0020_40_toya/0101_0701_02_10:
You never know when someone might want to
trick-or-treat!
ch0020_40_toya/7101_0701_01_10:
I don’t want people thinking I’m childish, but I’ve
always been afraid of ghosts.
ch0020_40_toya/7101_0701_02_10:
So whenever I’m walking alone in the dark at
night, I get so nervous thinking that I’ll see one...
ch0020_40_toya/7101_0701_03_10: But I can’t be a scaredy-cat forever, right?
ch0020_40_toya/7101_0701_04_10:
I decided to join the Midnight Parade so I can get
used to scary things.
ch0020_40_toya/7102_0701_01_10:
I saw sync pairs around town all dressed up, and
everyone’s costumes were great!
ch0020_40_toya/7102_0701_02_10:
Swishing tails, glowing eyes... It was like seeing
real ghosts!
ch0020_40_toya/7102_0701_03_10:
I guess if you’re going to dress up, you’ll want to
go all out.
ch0020_40_toya/7103_0701_01_10:
Last night, I saw a strange Pokémon walking
around town.
ch0020_40_toya/7103_0701_02_10:
It had pointy ears and a large grin... Just looking
at it sent a chill down my spine!
ch0020_40_toya/7103_0701_03_10: I think it might have been a Gengar...
ch0020_40_toya/7103_0701_04_10: It looked so strong, I couldn’t help but shiver!
ch0020_40_toya/7104_0701_02_10:
Haha, did I scare you? I was trying to imitate one
of Mightyena’s howls.
ch0020_40_toya/7104_0701_04_10:
I’m dressed up as Mightyena, so I figured I should
play the part.
ch0020_40_toya/7105_0701_01_10: I’m so glad I made the trip from Unova to Pasio.
ch0020_40_toya/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve been able to go on a lot of adventures and
have awesome battles with friends like
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0020_40_toya/7105_0701_03_10:
I even get to hang out and enjoy the 
Midnight Parade!
ch0020_40_toya/7105_0701_04_10: What more could I ask for?
ch0020_40_toya/1701_0701_01_10: Finally—there you are! Got a moment?
ch0020_40_toya/1701_0701_02_10: I have something to give you! Here, take this!
ch0020_40_toya/1701_0702_01_10:
I got it from someone I battled, so I thought I’d
share it with you.
ch0020_40_toya/1701_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’ll put it to good use!
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0701_01_10: In Unova, I met a lot of different people.
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0701_02_10: Kind people, amazing people, strong people...
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0701_03_10:
My countless encounters there helped me
grow into the Trainer I am today.
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0701_04_10:
That’s why I think the Midnight Parade will make
me stronger, too.
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0702_01_10:
Meeting people here on Pasio will definitely
make you stronger.
ch0020_40_toya/2501_0702_02_10: I hope meeting me helped you in some way!
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0701_01_10:
You keep getting stronger and stronger, and I will,
too. I don’t want to lose!
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0701_02_10:
I don’t want people thinking I’m childish,
but I’m a bit of a sore loser.
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0701_03_10:
I won’t stop challenging you, so let’s have some
great battles!
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0701_04_10: I won’t lose, so let’s keep on battling each other!
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0702_01_10: I think wanting to win is an important feeling.
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0702_02_10:
Because when we want to win, that’s when we 
can have an all-out battle!
ch0020_40_toya/2511_0702_03_10:
Let’s keep getting stronger so we can have the
greatest battle ever!
ch0020_40_toya/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Did ya eat a good breakfast? You’ll feel
better if you eat.
ch0020_40_toya/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! Eating lunch made me sleepy...
ch0020_40_toya/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening. A day goes by fast, huh? I’m not done
having fun yet!
